name: The Way Out (Nebuchaddy, rusty fishburger, TheUsualCB)
name_original: The Way Out (Nebuchaddy, rusty fishburger, TheUsualCB)
description:
Entry for the Legacy Mob Beginner Jam 16.

Are you sure you are safe within your own walls?

An experimental horror game in which you only have one mission. You are trapped in your home, but something's coming. You only need to defend yourself, but things aren't always that easy.

WASD - Move

E - Interact

Can you find solace?

The game is best played when downloaded. If you want to experience the game as intended, scroll down and download one of the files.

CREDITS

A game by Enrique "Nebuchaddy" Lopez for the 5-Days LM0B Game Jam #16
